product_name: Topeak RideCase with Mount - Galaxy S4
long_description: Designed specifically for the Samsung Galaxy S4, the Topeak Waterproof RideCase with Mount keeps your phone within easy view on your handlebars while you ride. Integrated QuickClick mount allows installation on handlebar, stem, or stem cap, and you can rotate and adjust the angle for the best view. Impact-resistant plastic frame, carbon-fiber base plate and machined aluminum mount offer high durability. Topeak Waterproof RideCase with Mount offers IPX6 protection from rain, splashes and wet weather. Case offers easy access to power and volume buttons, and clear window offers full touch-screen functionality.
short_description: Designed specifically for the Samsung Galaxy S4, the Topeak Waterproof RideCase with Mount keeps your phone within easy view on your handlebars while you ride.
